home.description: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection

about.title: Cloud Town Exquisite Craft
about.subTitle: CTEC
features: One of the top green energy technology servers in Asia currently
Active in research on green energy technology within the vanilla Minecraft environment
Survival practice, redstone technology, architectural creation
A good creative environment and server equipment
Collaborative research and exchange with excellent players from various countries

card.title: Top-tier Architectural Team
card.description: We strive to blend Redstone and architecture, showcasing unique creations in survival mode. Our architects hail from diverse fields, each a master of at least one style. We believe that only by standing on the shoulders of giants can we broaden our horizons. In learning from the masters, we also frequently engage with teams and servers deeply rooted in the architectural community, including the Ghost Whale server, Arthas Industries, and the LIF Frame Wood Production Group. Yunzhen also provides a comprehensive set of plugins and a creative environment for architects to showcase their talents.

card.title: Advanced Redstone Technology
card.description: Our community boasts strong technical capabilities, with numerous Redstone technology developers proficient in various tech tree research, maintaining friendly relations with multiple international live electricity servers. Our team is dedicated to research and innovation, continuously rolling out various novel farms or components, providing more fun for community members. We have set up dedicated labs, including two creative servers and two mirror servers, allowing players who do not wish to play survival to join in the fun. We currently hold the world record certification for a copper oxidation farm.

card.title: Astonishing Equipment
card.description: We possess excellent server equipment, capable of supporting a large number of players online simultaneously for development and play. We have low-latency connection proxy servers in various countries, providing an excellent gaming experience for players from different regions. Our equipment features an i9-13900K, 128G RAM, 6TB Gen 4 SSD, and a UPS uninterrupted power supply system. We also have amateur engineers maintaining the servers, ensuring their stable operation.

members.description: Excellent members in various fields create wonderful server records
